page.title: 17Danson Mansion
page.content: In the park stands Danson Mansion_recently sold to a private company for restoration as offices.Around the house is the large public park,which is very important to Bexley people. The mansion has three storeys.A large stairway goes up to the middle storey where all the important living rooms used to be,The ground floor was used by the servants.The kitchens were down there.On the roof there are lots of chimneys and each chimney has a pot called a CROWN.They had lots of chimneys because each room had its own fire.
